attributes.action: E.U. IN / OUT REFERENDUM IN DANGER !!
attributes.additional_details:
REMEMBER THE 2010 REFERENDUM PROMISE BY OUR PRIME MINISTER!

The E.U. is bringing in a QUALIFIED MAJORITY VOTING SYSTEM which may allow the 2017 referendum promIsed by David Cameron to be REFUSED and therefore never happen !!.

In view of our country's recent E.U. Election results we now need our IN / Out referendum BEFORE OUR OWN 2015 ELECTION to ensure that the Referendum takes place.

ONCE BITTEN -TWICE SHY !!
